SYSTEM: Chowlk_framework_slides.pdf: Página 41
Chowlk framework© María Poveda Villalón  & Serge Chávez-Feria
Current Limitations
42
§ The converter only supports relationships between properties (e.g. 
subPropertyOf) using the option 2 of the visual notation.
§ If the model is big or complex, detecting and correcting syntax errors can 
be tedious.
§ Comments, descriptions or additional metadata over the ontological
elements is not supported.
